name: SpaceMcShooty
description:
Team Name
Anton Games

Gameplay Instructions
A/D - move
Left Mouse Button - shoot
Spacebar - pause game and open menu
1, 2, 3, 4 - purchase upgrades (may be used even when the game is not paused)
9 - (cheat) set prices of all upgrades to 0
R - restart (available when the game is paused)
Esc - quit game (available when the game is paused)

What platfom has the game been built for?

Windows 64 bit

Content that was created before the Jam and has been included in the final submission
- Haunted by Shirk (music)
- laser sounds and cat meowing from freesound.org
- Nyan Cat image

Gameplay Video
